founders.name: Advocate Suryansh Shukla
founders.title: Senior Partner & Corporate Law Specialist
founders.description: With over 15 years of experience in corporate law, Advocate Suryansh Shukla specializes in mergers & acquisitions, corporate governance, and complex business litigation. His expertise has helped numerous companies navigate complex legal challenges and achieve their business objectives.

founders.name: Advocate Divyansh Shukla
founders.title: Senior Partner & Criminal Law Expert
founders.description: Advocate Divyansh Shukla brings extensive experience in criminal defense and civil litigation. His strategic approach to complex cases and dedication to protecting client rights has earned him recognition as one of the leading criminal law practitioners in the region.
